string.text: \n
SIDOROVICH
%c[255,255,128,128]Welcome back Marked One... the bridge soldiers just sent me an SMS that you were seen by the loft... make sure to come by and visit!
Tweed's book
Incomplete book: 'For Women with an Adventurous Notion to Explore the Zone' by L. D. Tweed
Strange things have happened up North... not sure who to trust anymore... Seems there is something MUCH BIGGER brewing up there! You of all people should know what is going on and where
Hmmm... well..\nI heard rumors... just rumors... that the Monolith found something alien in nature and have stashed it somewhere around the NPP
Alien?!!!
What I heard... OK!\nThere was talk about a strange generator that warps gravity itself, even rumors that those reported gravity anomalies are results of testing by the Monolith
This doesn't sound good... imagine the Monolith scum bouncing around space or warps or whetever...\nmight as well wrap it up and flush the whole universe!
Knowing the make-up of those bastards... I would bet that it would just clog and overflow!
No kidding... even a plunger wouldn't help us, eh...

Well there is something else..
There is a search going on for a set of documents that supposedly map out a secret array of portals from under the old Hospital.
It is believed that they will trigger a special chamber of portals when all placed properly within the chamber slots.
Word out of Rostok is that a stranger was asking about documents stamped with the code 'ZEP' on them
A series of portals to where...? this could be real trouble if the wrong person were to achieve it!

Yes... they could wipe out the Zone and have full control of whatever it is that was found! Hopefully it is just rumors and has no merit but I shudder to think it may be true...\nI also heard about a path to an area reffered to as Darkscape, not sure why they call it that... seems a lot of activity there lately.\nI uploaded the location of it for you, out of the Dark Valley
This is bad... can't count on it being fantasy... I think I will check it out, thanks for the info
Facility F1... Well?
Who did you talk to?!
Her name is Tweed and..
Tweed... alive?... great news!\nHow is she?
Alone and in need of ammo for her AK... maybe even a better weapon with a sight to help keep Darkscape clear of intruders
Done!\nI'll give you a sniper rifle I just got in trade and some ammo for it and the AK.\nTake it back to her and maybe she will have more to tell you... who knows
So... what about F1?
All I know is that something big was being transported there.\nI had a trader friend up there that had sent me an SMS just before things went bad
What did he say, what happened?
His first SMS was telling me about a convoy of trucks..\nnext SMS was about a big flash and a cloud of smoke all over, that was the last message
No word from him since?
There has been nothing from that region since... nothing at all
Marked One. You need to talk to the barman in Rostok about that stranger... he was asking questions about you
Hey! Who are you?
Tweed, and you?
Most call me Marked One
What brings you around this hole?
I'm searching for some documents, they are marked with the initials 'ZEP'... seen any?
Not seen any around these parts but most of what was here has been burned or moved
Moved?... where and why would it be moved?

Don't have a clue why but I do know that they were taking whatever they did find to a place they kept calling F1.\nThey were storing them in the old gas station where a chopper would land and pick them up every few days
F1... yea I've heard of it, way up north. It was called Facility F1 and some bad crap came down there. Rumors of an alien ship or weapon... not sure now
I heard one of the guards telling another one that he should not wander from the chopper when they get there as many bad-ass creatures live there
Anything else they said? Are there any of them still around?
Not been out much lately as I am low on ammo for this old AK of mine..\nWell... I could try to use my charm to find out more, but a favor for a favor..
Of course... wouldn't expect less. What is it I can do for you?

There is a book that I have been writing about this hell-hole for the adventurous woman... I had stashed it in an old bar in the Northeast.\nI think there was a research station a few kilometers south of it. If you find it in your travels then please SMS me at: @TWEED... I will let you know what to do with it.\nI will upload a path I found that will lead you to the Cordon, it may save you some time
Sure, why not. I hope that it is still there and in readable condition, you know the TP situation here!
Well... not a big chance this will happen!
Here it is... and still in one piece
I am in your debt!\nI put another route on your PDA, you might find it interesting
I brought you more ammo and a new weapon so you can keep annoying the intruders
Thanks a lot! This will keep me busy for a week or two!\nHere's a key I found last time I was out, looks like a vehicle key of some sort... maybe you can use it
Thanks, do get tired of walking!\nOh yea... Sid says hi... So you plan to stay here?
Sid? You mean that son of a psydog is still kickin... of course that relic will go on forever!\nI think I will stay... things are less harsh here and the blowouts are very weak
Ha... that he is! What will you do here?

I will set up a trade route and wait for others to join me, do visit me once in awhile.\nAlmost forgot... you should check out the gas station as they were in a hurry last trip and may have been careless... worth a look
Hi Tweed. How's life been for you lately?
Not so good, marked One
Tell me about it
A new faction has been raiding the area and may be moving in, they have recruited bandits and made camp West of here.\nThey are ruthless and shoot first... I have kept them away so far
Let me take a look around and see if I can discourage them from moving here

You talk as though I am unable... but I am stressed to keep up sometimes...\nMost of them have been coming from southeast and have been moving toward the Dark Valley so I would start there. Oh... and thanks Marked One!
So tell me about this stranger that has been going around asking questions
Cold kind of creep... the kind you cross the street to avoid if you know what I mean
Ok great... he has bad karma so maybe there is something a little more important
You need a drink to calm those nerves!... as I was saying... because of his 'bad karma' he didn't get much cooperation so he was drowning himself in liquid anger... loosened the tongue a bit
Alright, alright... what did you get out of him?
Have you heard of F1?
A bit, a lot of rumors about a strange object and a big blast while transporting it

This object was something that baffled every scientist put in front of it... but they did determine that it had been stashed here for some time and was staged to activate but when and how was not known
I found a document that outlines a plan to activate the device but there seems to be more to it. There is a project 'ZEP' that talks about an 'object' and also an array of portals
He mentioned 'zep' many times... thought it was his lost dog or something by the way he sighed each time he mentioned it
Thanks... I think I will go and talk to the geeks and also to the Dolg commander and see what they said to him
Man what a day! What a bunch of clowns you have running things around here!
Take it you had a talk with the commander over there
Talk?... You call it talk?... What happened to him anyway... monoxide poisoning?
Not sure but I try to leave him alone
I did figure out that the stranger was looking for the Wasted Woodland. What could be out there that would interest him?
There was the old woodcutter shack... way in the North West of the region.\nI know of a path from the North entrance that should save you some time, I will upload it for you
Thanks... I will see what I can find there
Do you know of an old bar way to the north?
There are many bars... why?
I met this doll Tweed... she said it was a couple Kilometers North of a research lab
Tweed? Damn! She owes me money... and a couple rounds for the bar! How is she anyway?
Healthy and hard core... going to try and establish a trading post in Darkscape
I should get in touch with her... could be a good business opportunity, eh. As far as the bar..\nyes there is but it is inside a military compound and I don't think you would be very welcome
Well... I have a habit of not being welcome but I think I can live with it! Let me know if anything else comes up... you know I share the wealth so don't hold back
So... tell me about the stanger, why was he trying to get in the back?

Son of a Bitch tried to come in through the old exit but made too much noise when he hit the iron gate. My guard chased him into the Wild Territory where he lost him. Whatever it was he wanted must be important to him so I doubt that he is too far away
This is getting to be a real steeplechase! Me following him, while he is following me, and both of us after???\nI wonder where he will turn up next?
It's only been a couple of days so you might start looking for him around one of the old campsites in the Wild Territory
Thanks for the info and advice
This is getting to be a real steeplechase! Me following him while he is following me and both of use after ????\nI was able to find his camp in the Wild Territory but can't tell where he has gone
He didn't come back through Rostok or the guards whould have alerted me. He must have used a different path out of there
I think I will try the Warehouses... maybe he has been seen passing through there recently
Say hi to Fox if you see him there, haven't heard from him in awhile
Sure thing, thanks for the info
Hail 'Fat One'... and how's life treating you?
At least I don't look like I've been eating rats and sleeping in sewers for the last few weeks! What's up?
Never could catch up with that stranger... been to that bar up North, found Tweeds book..
He hasn't been back here... A book? Did you read it? You aught to get it back to her as soon as you can, I bet she is eager for it..
Looked at it... not my kinda reading. Suppose your right, who knows... I may even get something out of it
I could use a nice cold keg of beer right now!
Sounds like you've had a hard day of it..
That's an understatement for sure! Everytime I turn around there is someone or something chasing me, never a dull moment!
From what I've heard... it's you doing all the chasing!
More the reason I need to drown myself in liquid sorrow... eh?
Did you talk to the stranger that was going around asking questions the other day?
Stranger... I would have a different name to describe that walking evil!
What did he ask?
About some documents I never heard about... and you
ME!... what do you mean, what did he ask?
He wanted to know about a man with your mark on his arm and where he might be now.\nI told him you were through here a long time back but haven't seen you since... that's all, swear
Still stuck here I see... what can you tell me about the stranger who was asking around about me?
Delightful sole... lifted my spirits and made me not care about this pit for awhile!
You know... I am not surprised you two hit it off... having heard about this guy.\nI need to know what he wanted, what was he asking?
I told him about your work for me and our plans to retire in Moscow together. Sweet mother of my sole..
Are you Okay? who's going to Moscow with you... we in the same room?
Moscow... great place it is... want to go there with me? What you here for?
Okay... well... thanks anyway..
Tell me about ZEP and your copy of the codes
ZEP... ZEP... Ah... codes, codes, codes..
Where is it? Give me the codes so we can go to Moscow
Moscow... go, go, go... let's all go to Moscow!
Where is it... what did you do with ZEP... try and find ZEP..
Gone... stranger came to take... but can't find.\n MAD MAD MAD!... that was him... MAD MAD MAD!
Ok... Ok... you take it easy... later..
Tell me about this stranger... what was he after?
Whatever it is... this ZEP conspiracy or whatever... it has me nervous!
That isn't hard to achieve... but please doctor, tell me anything that might be important

He has something to do with whatever happened at F1, nothing has been heard from there since the explosion..\neh... this stranger... and I do mean strange!... had the air of an extremely well educated scientist and he is obviously looking for something very powerful
Did he mention anything about me? Where did he say he was going next?

He did... he asked me to track your PDA but I told him you had one of the new modified devices that I could not track.\nHe seemed a little skeptical but then he asked about the Wasted Woodland which I new nothing about
Thanks... is my device really modified? Is this possible?

Actually it is a modified device, remember the chip that was placed in it when it had malfunctioned?\nWell... when you had me remove it I decided to leave the device hard code disabled which in effect makes it unidentifiable remotely. You still get your messages but your satellite bounce-back identity is 'nil'.
Getting too techy now so I'm gonna split... thanks for everything
I have your flight recorder, pain in the butt to carry so I expect a decent payment
You are amazing marked One!\nHere is 5000... that ought to be sufficient!, eh?\nand a key that I think may come in useful to you... who knows..
All right, fair enough but what about this object that I supposedly lost?.
The Soul Cube was here... but the person who has it decided to leave. I told him that it was yours and that you knew how it works
What did he want for it?\nDo you have any idea where he went?
He wouldn't say what he wanted for it but did say he considered it priceless.\nHe talked about taking it to the NPP and trying to make it work there where anomalous energy is at its greatest strength
Damn... last place I want to go to is around that plant!\nIf the radiation and anomalies don't get you those jumper-snorks will!
Did a stranger talk to you lately?
As a matter of fact yes... why?
He has been poking his nose into my affairs and I want to know why and better yet... who he is!
He seems to have lost something very important... he had an air of desperation that caused me to fear him
What did he ask you?.

Mostly about the commander... seeing how he has flown over the kookoos nest... eh. he wanted to know where he kept his private papers at.\nI told him to leave the base immediately and not return... haven't seen him since
I guess even a half-wit commander deserves loyalty to some extent..
Hail trader... any news?
Nothing out of the ordinary... strange intense blowout a few days ago... Ivantsov chasing some stranger out at gunpoint... commander vacationing in Moscow... eh... how's it with you?
Same as usual... can you tell me anything about that stranger?
Not much. He avoided me for some reason... didn't think I looked that mean!
Not sure mean is the word I would use... so there is nothing you can tell me about him at all?
I did notice that he had a strange patch on his vest, never seen it before.\nIt was sorta like a Helix over a silver cloud with a small round symbol not unlike a radiation warning sign
Never heard of it either... all we need is some new faction coming in here and stirring things up
What are you doing here?
Not sure... I was working in the tunnel when I felt a surge of heat and then woke up to the place abandoned
Who was that soldier and why was that tank out there?
He told me to stay put and not try to leave. He said something about evac choppers
What are they going to evacuate from here... monsters?
Don't know, that soldier was talking on the radio about some gold bars stashed in an attic in the village.\nHe sounded very excited about it and was on his way there
What will you do now?
Wait here... my collegues should come back now that the military is gone
Good luck with that... seems like it is too overrun for you geek types
The mosters can be dealt with once they get back with decent weapons
How did you get here?
I followed these creeps down here when I saw what they were transporting... looked valuable
So... what is it and why did they bring it here?
I heard a man yelling at them while they were activating it, he was telling them to increase the power to spread the field over the entire Zone
So... they brought it here for the power but what did he mean by entire Zone?
All I can do is guess but for sure it cannot be good... I think that we should deactivate it some how
How the hell do we do that? The energy seems to have built up to a point where everything is fused, we need something to interact with the energy field
Like what exactly..
Negative energy, like a Black Energy Anomaly. We need to find one and drop it into the sphere of energy
Hey Glavny
What's wrong, go find a Black Energy and hurry!
I can't find one... where the hell can I get one?
Search around the NPP Generators, they seem to spawn there often
Okay, Okay... don't get so worked up..
Hey Glavny
If you have it then drop it on the generator, quick!
ALRIGHT, ALRIGHT get a grip!
What did you say about a Soul Cube in that message?
Why? Are you interested in it?
Yes and I am serious about getting it back!

Getting it back? You know Shadows? Okay, look... I was told by a deserter that he knew where it is, he said it was far South in the outpost firing range. I know a path from here to the wild territory, should make travelling a little easier
A way out to Pripyat if you can find the way..
There is a secret portal out here somewhere..
Distress call from a lab in the North NPP area
ZEP Confidential Release
Agent 'X'
Recent Millitary Activity

ZEP [00]
.
FOR LEVEL 1 OPERATIVES ONLY
These reports will continue until further notice. Monitor them constantly as this information is time sensitive.
As you know two objects of alien nature have been discovered. These reports will keep you informed on their status.
.
This device appears to have a relationship with 'Object X' recently discovered in a secret lab - location confidential.
After delivery of the first object to Facility F1: team eleven will attempt to assemble it in the compound area.
.
Central Command ORD-10639
Who was here recently?

ZEP [01]
.
To activate the portal system requires proper placement of special artifacts within the chamber slots. There are special codes on each of the last six pages that define the artifact and which slot. These pages have been seperated from the rest of the document. Three individuals will each be given a copy of these codes so that at least one will be able to complete the activation.
Holder List:
Voronin - Rostok
Nardistik - Research Center
Dominik - Agroprom Compound
.
Spatial Warp Generator:
A secondary object was also found in the laboratory. How long it has been there and how it continues to operate is a mistery. A special team of scientists is being assembled in the Old Village to analyze the device. A second team will be sent to F1 to analyze the first object and attempt to determine its origin.
.
Central Command ORD-10640
What the hell would anyone want here?

ZEP [02]
.
The team in the Old Village was transported to the lab today. They will begin work immediately to determine what went wrong.
Strange emmisions have recently been detected coming out of Backwater. A chopper has been dispatched to attempt to locate its source. It must be investigated as if it is related to the objects with the utmost urgency.
.
Central Command ORD-10725
Is this just a wild goose chase?

ZEP [03]
.
It was reported by the transport team that the object has begun to vibrate and glow slightly. They are half way to their destination, a squad of military is being dispatched to Pripyat to escort them the rest of the way.
.
Central Command ORD-10733
Could they be searching for the Doctor?

ZEP [04]
.
Strange Blast:
On arriving at F1 there was a huge explosion that appears to have originated from the object. There is no communication at this point and air surveillance indicates the area is extremely high in radiation. Present dissipation indicates that the area will be re-enterable in four days.
A secondary team has been assembled in the old Jupiter Rail Station that will stand ready to support team twelve.
.
Central Command ORD-10744
Always a hot spot for Mercs

ZEP [05]
.
Temporary headquarters have been relocated to the old research station until F1 is safe to re-enter. Team eleven has been completely wiped out and team twelve has arrived at the lab and has started analyzing the second object. It is unknown when team twenty will be assembled and arrive at F1 after the radiation levels decrease. An agent has been dispatched to East Pripyat in search of one of the original scientists that worked on the Monolith project. His name is Glavny and he may have an idea as to what the object is here for.
.
Central Command ORD-10871
At least it's in the city!\nMight have to push on some doors to get it done!

ZEP [06]
.
Lab Disaster:
Team twelve has vanished from the lab. No indication as to what happened at this point but it appears to have been caused by a power surge from the object. Special agent; code name 'AX' will be dispatched to the lab to investigate the occurance and attempt to locate survivors.
It is also advised that an agent for the Monolith has been seen in the old Distribution Center. Send a small detachment to investigate and possibly apprehend this agent.
Person of interest: name unknown, has tattoo on arm 'S.T.A.L.K.E.R.', was involved in the NPP disaster involving the 'OC', consider dangerous, try to bring in alive.
.
Central Command ORD-10877
Follow the path of 'AX'

ZEP [07]
.
Lab Report:
Agent 'AX' has determined that the object had been compromised by the scientists of team twelve. This caused a feedback condition that created a portal of extreme magnitude. Where the team was teleported to is unknown. Our agent has informed me he is travelling south looking for an individual that may have information about the lab. His last known location was in the Rostok area but there are also rumors that he is buried in the old Cemetery.
.
Central Command ORD-10913
Bring out your dead

ZEP [08]
.
AX Report 1:
Our agent located Voronin, he appears to have lost his copy of the activation codes and has also lost his mind. Agent 'AX' is travelling to Dead City following the trail of the second code holder. He also intends to re-visit the Cemetery as he has new information to go on.
.
Central Command ORD-11003
This guy just loves dead places

ZEP [09]
.
AX Report 2:
Cemetery turned up nothing, Agent 'AX' has informed me that he will spend some time searching Dead City. A report has also come in that someone was in the old Warlab recently.
.
Central Command ORD-11009
Going underground for this one..

ZEP [10]
.
AX Report 3:
Second code holder 'Nardistik' found, grave is in the old Cemetery East of Pripyat. No indication as to how and where he died, and what became of his things. Agent 'AX' has searched the area thoroughly and is now headed to the Dead Marshes on another lead.
.
Central Command ORD-11011

Marked one... I need your help. A chopper has gone down in the Dead Marshes that was making special measurements. Find me the flight recorder, bring it to me and I will pay you as well as reward you with something you have lost
Better carry some dry socks

ZEP [11]
.
AX Report 4:
Agent 'AX' has located information that the third code holder may be in the old Research Station comm facility. There is also a small group of scientists there that may be able to help locate him.
.
Central Command ORD-11016
Heard strange stories about tunnels in this place.\nWierd Anomolies too..

ZEP [12]
.
AX Report 5:
Dead marshes did not turn up anything concrete. Minor resistance was experienced from the locals so a detachment has been sent to gain order there.
Agent 'AX' was forced to retreat from the Dead Marshes to the Distribution Center. It is expected that he will re-group with central in the Old Research Station within the next two days.
.
Central Command ORD-11019
Marked one... you need to get back here right away. That stranger was here and tried to break into the back. Not sure what he wanted... more when you get here
Getting close to 'AX'?

ZEP [13]
.
AX Report 6:
'AX' failed to gain access to the Associate's locker where Voronin's codes are suspected to be.
He was forced to flee into the Wild Territory to avoid confrontation. There was word from the Research Station that he is being tracked by someone. 'AX' is heading to the abandoned Military Warehouses in an attempt to intercept him.
.
Central Command ORD-11023
Always a nice place to visit..

ZEP [14]
.
AX Report 7:
Military Warehouses did not turn up anything except an excessive amount of Bandits. 'AX' is in the NPP after a secondary suspect which may be of interest. This suspect may have the 'Soul Cube' that was recorded in earlier events with the 'OC'.
The team in the Research Station have departed to Techniques but have left an injured collegue in a trailor near the trail entrance.
.
Central Command ORD-11026
Left one behind!

ZEP [15]
.
AX Report 8:
Second suspect was located near the cooling towers, decapitated and no sign of the 'Soul Cube'.
Strange activity has been reported out of Techniques near the old motor pool facility. Attempts to get close have failed due to an exceptionaly strong Controller in the area. 'AX' will arrive there later today and will attempt to neutralize it.
.
Central Command ORD-11029
What's going down at the Motorpool?

ZEP [16]
.
AX Report 9:
Techniques has proven to be a difficult area so the team has moved on to the far NE Helipad for transport to the Broken Road Facility.
.
Central Command ORD-11038
Gotta catch a flight!

ZEP [17]
.
Destruction Notice:
Team seven has been tasked with the destruction of all materials and information stored at site ALPHA. You are to assist them in any way necessary. Upon completion both teams are to relocate to the eastern tunnel until further instructions.
A map found on a dead stalker indicates a path from the Research Station tunnels to a small underground hideout. 'AX' is going to attempt to locate this path and search the hideout.
.
Central Command ORD-11035
Gotta dig deep for this one!

ZEP [18]
.
AX Report 10:
'AX' has located a dispatch that indicates a meeting between the suspect found in the NPP and an unknown group. He is heading to End Station where the meeting is set to take place. Note was damaged so the date and time are not known.
.
Central Command ORD-11041
Take a train to ????

ZEP [19]
.
AX Report 11:
Resistance was encountered at the End Station when 'AX' arrived. No survivors to interogate, 'AX' will search the area for any information about the objects and the individual tracking him. His next location of interest will be the Courtyards and Market areas.
.
Central Command ORD-11046
Let's go shopping

ZEP [20]
.
AX Report 12:
More resistance encountered in the Courtyards, a few fled toward the old Market. 'AX' is following them in an attempt to get a prisoner to interrogate.
.
Central Command ORD-11051
Might be a good place to trade

ZEP [21]
.
AX Report 13:
Market was abandoned and no evidence found as to where they went from there. 'AX' is now heading for the Broken Road Laboratory east of Facility F1 where information on the blast was kept. The hasty retreat from that area after the blast may have caused information to be left behind.
.
Central Command ORD-11055
Into the danger Zone..

ZEP [22]
.
AX Report 14:
Information has been recovered in the lab pertaining to the object and subsequant blast. It indicates that there was a huge wave of heat prior to the blast that seemed to warp time itself. Several scientists reported a gap in their work reports that did not make sense. 'AX' has also encountered more and stronger creatures in the area.
Facility F1 has become tolerable and 'AX' is attempting to enter the area.
.
Central Command ORD-11057
Strangest place I have ever been..

ZEP [23]
.
AX Report 15:
F1 is extremely hot and destruction was wide spread. There appears to have been two explosions, both convoys seem to be the central points for these explosions. The crystal object being transported appears to be inert now, no activity or energy of any kind. 'AX' was unable to get close to them as the radiation is still off the charts at those two locations.
'AX' has been dispatched to the Jupiter area where seismic activity has been recently recorded beneath the old Jupiter Complex.
Armored vehicles are being deployed in the elevator area as a precaution.
Central Command ORD-11060
Goin down under again..

ZEP [24]
.
AX Report 16:
It has been reported that heavy resistance was encountered in the underground facility discovered beneath the complex. There has been no communication with agent 'AX' since this last report. A military group is being dispatched to infiltrate the underground and gain control there.
.
Central Command ORD-11064
Notes and Memos
Missed you, sorry I came so late.\nWe can meet at the old lab just a short ways Southwest from here. Come alone and bring the package with you.\nOzzi
Jack
Been waiting here too long, doors are broken and provide no protection.\nI will meet you at the bar, you know where. Don't loose that package and be careful!\nOzzi
Jack

In case you come by here.\nHad to leave early to the meeting place that we agreed upon earlier. Tweed and Dominik have already left and I hope to catch up with them before they get to the old bar.\nOzzi
Jack

ALL POINTS: WANTED FOR QUESTIONING\nAll points of transit be aware of an individual seen in the area that is wanted for questioning. His name is not known, he displays a silver colored patch not known to these parts. Report his location but do not approach without adequate backup. Notify the top command in your area immediatly if spotted
DISPATCH

Intercepted a dispatch from our bastard neighbors...\nRemember that boar-dung that passed through here a few days back? They want him, we should go after this trash and use him for leverage. I trailed him as far as the river, I am sure he went accross it to East Pripyat. How and where he got accross I do not know for sure but there must be a way. Be ready with a squad for when I arrive, I will try and find his path.\nPatch
Commander

I was here for the package, could not stay as things are too insane.
Will get in touch with you at the old bar North of the Research Station.
.
Nardistik
Tweed

Place is deserted, not sure what happened here.
Woke up to a band of Bandits outside the barracks this morning, surprised them with a grenade out the window. That sort of perked me up and gave me new strength, is that sick?
Hope you get this note as I am leaving for the NPP, can't wait here any longer. I was able to talk to some stalkers in an old farmhouse, they said that a group of scientists went through here on their way to the NPP Control Center. No doubt the stalker that has been tracking me is also following them or will be. If I am lucky I will cross paths with him and deal with this character and maybe even find out what he wants first, maybe.
.
X
Snatch

I am not sure what happened. I entered a purple fog in the Northern part of the NPP and somehow ended up on a roof near the NPP Generators. There were Monolith there and I was able to sneak away but had to leave my stuff behind. If you find this letter then I am most likely dead, beware of the fog, it has strange powers
Unknown
If you read this before going below, then be warned: you will most likely NOT come back out!
Fox

I had to sleep here last night, nothing but nightmares. Something bad happened here and a heavy presence haunts this place.
I am heading for the tower, you know where.
.
Ozzi
Jack

Professor, I had to leave this place! Something has been trying to get in here but I can't see anything. It must be BIG from the pounding it does as the whole lab shakes from it!
I must try to get out of here after it leaves the next time, I don't know where I will go as this whole region is unsafe.
.
Glowworm
Aleks

Take your offer and shove it!
If I see even one of your goons near my camp, there will be retaliation!
Keep your ugly snoz out of my business!
Your ENEMY
Commander

I wrote this instead of seeing you again.
You're ok, don't get me wrong but I need my space and you just won't give it to me.
I left you food and ammo, hope to cross paths again soon. I am heading South to look for a quiet place to settle, good luck!
Tweed
Sparrow
Today they told us to leave, not how or where but... just leave.\nI plan to hide in the bunker until they are gone and then figure out what to do. I will write again as soon as
Dear Mom

I am sorry that it has been so long since you have heard from me. I was forced to leave the lab area under gunfire and ended up in an old attic. I am ok, hungry but ok.\nI plan to travel south to a place they call Rostok. I will write again when I get there.\nDexter
Dear Mom

This dispatch is to warn you of an individual that is apparently tracking you. Reason is unknown as attempts to subdue the individual have resulted in the loss of several soldiers. All attempts have ceased by this command, you are on your own. Take steps to eliminate him before he gets to F1 and finds th..
AX
If you are reading this note then you are in my hideout and you should leave now without touching anything! Don't make me come looking for you as I am not a nice guy!\nYOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!
READ THIS!

Immediately all personnel are to report to their staging area. Take all data with you and deposit in the receptacle provided. Transport will commence promptly and there will be no return flight. It is your responsibilty to arrive at the staging area prior to departure.\nCentral Command ORD-11019
Evacuation Notice

All items stored in this bunker must be transported to Facility F1 by the end of the week. Those containers marked 'AX' must arrive intact and unopened.
If items are going to be compromised then they must be destroyed before falling into enemy hands.
Operatives at F1 will identify themselves as agents of 'X', you will release everything to them including the transport vehicle.
.
Central Command ORD-11073
Team Alpha

Waited as long as I could but armored vehicles started arriving.\nI am heading toward the old checkpoint near the far pits, you might catch up with me there. If I see I am being followed we will have to meet at the old bar.\nScabs
Vin
Beware of the Soul Cube!\nIt feeds on your soul as well as your enemies', I am empty. It has left me. I can feel its presence, like its waiting for me to follow.\nBut where?
Anyone

Potski,
I have located the bars and will disperse them in safe locations to be picked up later. I have left you this note so that you can find them if anything happens to me. That Bloodsucker butt 'AX' has been dogging me for awhile now but he split for F1 when word went out that it was safe to enter. I would most likely be dead now if that had not happened when it did!
I am heading to our favorite hangout where the first bar will be stashed, they are heavy so I must use a vehicle to get them out of here. No doubt 'AX' or one of his minions will detect my movement so I need to go quickly. Here is the first location, you know where it is: NE-BAR-UP, FENCE-E, GAP-N, FENCE-W, TWINS-X
Eleven of the fifteen have special markings - do not loose them!
Take them to the old tunnels when you have them all.
.
Gen Kirschi
The Spot

Will meet at 'pipes end'. Bring goods for the trade and don't cross me or the Zone won't be big enough to hide in!
Just in case you get greedy, I have hidden two of the bars
CEM-TNL-BNDT and JUP-LAB-TNT
.
Scabs
Sodar
Moved them: OLD-STV-N, OLD-STV-W, you may get wet.\n.\nA third on a table in a very old Hospital
Relocated

I found a document deep in the lab yesterday. It outlines a series of steps for placing special gold ingots in specific spots in an old tunnel somewhere.
The ingots have codes that indicate which spot it is supposed to be dropped at. It also indicates that they must be placed in a certain order which is continued on the next page. I cannot find this page so I don't know the order!
I also found a note with this scribbled on it:
DS-RB1-NE-RKS
GR-BAR-HIGH-LDG
WT-YAN-TNT
.
no clue what they mean
Sacola
Gorto
Just because you messed with my shack!!!!\n.\nCaretaker
Trespassers

I am trapped here
controller outside trying to get to me
.
leaving my stuff and will try to run for it
if you find this then I did not make it
the gold bar is important take to Veronin in Rostok
there is another bar in the northern research village tower
Death Eagle
no choice

must be done to control the intensity.\nEach Ingot with a code on it must be placed in the proper slot and in the proper order.\nIt is beleived that the order should be West to center then East to center. It is certain that the center is done last, the ingot marked C-C must be dropped in dead center of the tunnel
LOCATOR Page 2

LDK almost trapped me here
got the bars out earlier in three passes
I will meet up with you at the old house in Techniques
you know the one

Could only get to one, the others are located in x8 under water and deep under the NPP cooling cells.\n.\nNardistik

Needed to unload a little weight as I need to climb out of here.
I always hide them near small candles as a reference.

Caesier
My Monilith stash

One night in the Zone a strange cat came to me, after a small battle under a hunters moon and many dead animals, many rats, bloods, stalkers... perhaps I smell of rat?
Turning off the night vision we begin looting corpses, many dropped weapons, animal parts, and ammunition of course, normal stalking. well....
This strange cat hovering above the ground, now making cat noises...all four of the legs motionless...only hovering...the face turned away...
Sounded like a million running feet from all directions I turn on my light to get a better look. Of course this cat's face never turns to me, constantly looking at some objects far away...always, what does this cat look for? Where are her eyes?... very unusual...
What is another dead animal to the Zone anyway...
So we ready our weapon to shoot this cat, notice looking down for a moment to see we are stuck on a random boar corpse and fire a round into it, why not! Corpse in my way!?
As I look up to find this cat with iron sights... this cat perhaps heard my weapon? It moves now hovering at the speed of light diagonal from it's previous position to directly towards me, directly at me...this cat ran through me, slapped me harder than any stalker...the Zone was kind to spare me that night...
I still do not know how this happened, the guns to pickup were missing... did the cat take them? The dead rats flew off in different directions... the Zone is frightening... still have not recovered...
Grimwald
Diary entry: ??
Place is crawling with soldiers so I dropped the stash in this cave and hope I can escape this hell hole!\nGrey
Grey's stash
Have to check out what Arnie said about Grey
Area where chopper went down
Who might you be?
Karina Zetraphonic at your service.\nYou have a name or you shy?
Marked One, what are you doing here?\nLooks like you have been abandoned
I can't leave this place unguarded, the scientists will return once things quiet down
From what I have seen since I started travelling North is that things just keep getting worse
I wish those two jerks commanding the village and tunnel kill each other off and soon!
Tell me about them

The village has been there for more than a year and never bothered us.\nThe guerillas in the tunnel came in from the South and chased off everyone here claiming a military emergency or something.\nIt happened real fast and fighting errupted... I hit the swamps and avoided the search parties but they drove the rest out
Did you hear anything about what the emergency was or why they wanted such a shit hole?
I did hear something being yelled out about evac choppers comming from near a blast Zone... well that's what it sounded like
You don't know about F1 ?!... Those idiots found something powerful and while transporting it to F1 it went kaplui and wiped out the whole region.\nI wonder where those choppers were comming from
Only thing I know of near there is the old village and chemical lab.\nI think the village was called Broken Road... can't remember the lab's name though
Have you heard anyone say or get called X or AX or did a man with a silver emblem talk to you?

Sure did... he was yelling at a captain about a chopper that crashed. He also told several men to secure the tunnel for his headquarters.\nThat's when I split as they started to round up everybody... I don't react well to being herded!
I have to check out this tunnel, thanks!
You don't have to worry about that tunnel anymore, chased the vermin out... so to speak
You did that by yourself?!
Just sorta riled em up and they took each other out more than I got to!
Who the HELL are you?!!!\nNever let me piss you off! Please... I'm serious!
Look... no big deal, ok... I'm not a bad guy... really!
Why are you realy here and don't BS me... I know it must be important for someone like you to be here!
Interesting observation... I am following this agent 'AX', as he was following me and I think we both are looking for the same thing
You are following him and he is following you and you are looking for... what?
Don't realy know.\nI do know that it is very powerful and in the wrong hands will be a very evil tool. I also know that several factions will not hesitate to kill for it and already have
But who are you?\nWho sent you here?
Marked One... no one sent me..\nit just all happened..
Never did understand people like you..\nGOOD LUCK!... Marked One
How are things in wonderful swampland?..
There are MANY wonderful things here... if you ever looked at anything but money!
wow... I sure stepped in that one! SORRY!
ah... ok... just getting a bit lonely..
well... look, you sent me a message about strangers comming back?
There was two of them, they went to the old shack past the downed chopper to look for something
Did they say anything?
Only heard them yelling to each other as they ran away from the shack, sounded like what they were looking for was not there
Why did they run away?
OBVIOUSLY... they ran into the old controller that has settled there, been there for months
Oh yea... sorry, shoulda known about that controller... my mistake toooootally..
Hmmph, told you I was moody! Feel sorry for the sad soul that settles for you!
How are things in wonderful swampland?..
There are MANY wonderful things here... if you ever looked at anything but money!
wow... I sure stepped in that one! SORRY!
ah... ok... just getting a bit lonely..
well... look, you sent me a message about strangers coming back?
There were two of them, they went to the old shack past the downed chopper to look for something
Did they say anything?
Only heard them yelling to each other as they ran away from the shack, sounded like what they were looking for was not there
Met the controller there no doubt..
Seems they weren't prepared for dealing with it, just lucky for them they got away
That means someone will be coming back soon, you be careful
Don't have to worry about me! You look like you're not doing all that well to me! Hmmmph
Anything new around this Metropolis?..
Always with the pun... why are you back?
I could stop coming by..
Aren't you the sensitive one... poor baby... you can come by anytime you want!
All right then... but right now I need to know if anyone has been through here lately
I heard gunfire in the Northeast before sunset yesterday but no one came around here
Good... don't want anyone bothering you... except for me that is
You'll never be a bother to me!
Okay then... I better get off to the Northeast and see what I can find there
I know there is a path beyond the old bus that can lead you to the old Techniques center, maybe someone came down from there..
Thanks, I will see if it can lead me anywhere
You take care, Marked One
Informer?!... I would have shot you but... you look like you soiled your pants!
Thanks man!\nI just want to be left alone!
Relax... I don't care what you do as long as it doesn't threaten me.\nWhat are you doing way up here anyway?
I had to leave!\nThat commander is insane and I can't carry out his orders anymore..
He has gone a little off the deep end, eh...
Now I am a deserter and don't know what to do.\nI thought I could make it here but bandits keep passing through and trying to get my stuff
Well... I don't care what you do as long as you don't try and attack me, I have an ichy finger that is hard to control sometimes!
Okay... Okay... I don't want trouble!\nJust don't tell anyone you saw me Okay..
Sure and you do the same for me... got it?
No problem, I plan on heading North soon anyway
North?!..\nOnly thing North is desolation and lots of military factions running about
You sure?!\nI gotta get away from here and I don't know where to go
I know a town of deserters that may take you in.\nStay here until I return. I will talk to them and if I get you in then I want something in return
What do you want..
We'll discuss it when I return
Governor
Called the 'Governor' by those around him and obviously the boss, he seems to have some good connections
What is this place?
We call this the Waiting Room, why?
Seems strange having such a diverse group..
Take off stalker... don't like strangers poking around here!
Shelves a bit empty today, eh..
Who are you and what do you want?
Go by Marked One... and you?
They call me the Governor and I am getting tired of this conversation..
Look... sorry we got off to a bad start
Okay, then quickly... what do you want?
I know a deserter that got his butt stuck in the old Distribution District and I said I would ask if you would let him in
What can he contribute?
He was a dealer in information and may still have contacts
Not likely if he is on the run but maybe he can help cleaning out these damn creatures... seems like they just keep on comming..
Sounds like a great fit!
Is there anything I can do that would be of help? I most likely will be in the neighborhood often
BOOZE!... I will trade rare ammo for libations... of course Vodka will get you the most but even Beer will get you something
I think I can handle carrying around a few bottles
Greetings... have a bottle of Vodka!
Maybe you should find a bottle first... moron!
Great! take this ammo
Hey Governor... have a Beer
You know... it would be wise to lay off your stash so you can actually sell some of it
Hmmm... well I quess its worth something here... take this ammo
Glad to see I didn't waste a trip, you look hungry though
Rations running low and I don't like to wander around out there
You're in luck... you can go there but now we talk business
Thanks Marked One!\nWhat do you want?
I need information about a stranger that was in Rostok a while back, I understand you had a run-in with him
Okay... Okay... What can I tell you..\nah yea... this guy was different, cold and precise... like he was manufactered and not born..\nyou know... like no soul at all
What else do you remember... what did he say to you
F1... lots of talk about F1 and a lab... something about a connection between F1 and this lab... 14 yea... lab 14 he was calling it
A connection between a 'Lab 14' and F1? What kind of connection?\nWhat else can you remember?
Just something about codes and Voronin but it seemed like giberish at the time..\nThat's all I can remember, please don't hurt me..
Get it together man... you're pathetic!
I just want out... please help me get out of here..

Go far to the East and then North of the old research station when you reach it. You have to sneek into the military compound that surrounds the area that the village is in.\nYou'll find an old underground bar off what's left of a main freeway. Be careful passing through the village as it has been overrun by mutants.\nSay the Marked One sent you. See you around
Sorry... they don't want you there. Guess you'll have to make your way East and try to get out of the Zone where the radiation is weakest
Damn..\nthanks for nothing!
You're going to tell me anyway..\nI understand you had a run-in with this stranger that has been going around asking questions
Sorry... don't have time for babysitting.\nLike I said... go East through the barrier of the Zone but better wear a scientific suit or you'll fry..\nLots of luck!

Caesiers Underground teleports activated
Marked One... got word from the Generators that someone was in the Warlab recently, not of a known faction... you may want to investigate!

Marked One... Clear Sky Commander has informed me that an unknown faction was searching through the ruins by the old water tower. Captured one and he informed us that they were looking for a stalker referred to as the Marked One, there might be clues there for you
Marked One... Karina has contacted me and wants me to let you know they were back. They were arguing over who should clear out the Controller there
Tunnels Activated
Get to the Firing Range
Find the lab and help Glavny
Thanks, buddy, but now I must leave you
Thank you too. Good luck!
I need some backup,would you like to join me?
Sure, I have been eager to explore the Zone
Sorry, I have other plans
No way, You scare the hell out of me!
No way, go to hell, man! No one ever returned back after leaving with you! Look for "lockpicks" elsewhere
Sorry, but I just can't. The Zone has beat me down, I need to take a break
Hell No! I have no desire to 'RAMBO' around the Zone with a nut job like you!
Not a chance! I've heard all about you and I don't have a 'death wish' so bug off and find someone else!
No, you already have enough people with you. Don't wander around the Zone in crowds, you know, She does not like this
Do not be offended, Marked One, but as long as you're not from our faction - we have no business with you
Let's discuss our tactics
I'm listening
Follow me
How do I behave in this case?
Just follow me and stay alert
Come follow me and try to lead the enemy closer
Come follow me and attack only when absolutely necessary
Wait here
Waiting your orders
Just wait here and stay alert
Wait here and try to lead the enemy closer
Wait here and attack only when absolutely necessary
Sneak after me
Waiting your orders
Just sneak and stay alert
Sneak and try to lead enemy closer
Sneak and attack only when absolutely necessary
Hide here
Waiting your orders
Just hide here and stay alert
Hide here and try to lead enemy closer
Hide here and attack only when absolutely necessary
Thank you for your service, soldier. Dismissed!
Glory to the Duty!
Hey fighter, let's travel together?
Yes sir! Awaiting orders
Sorry, I have a job to do, I'm busy
Sorry, I will not go with you. The soldiers tell odd things about you...
No way, Marked One, you have a scary reputation. Every time you're returning back, your partner is no longer with you
Sorry, but I can't. I need a break after the attacks, tired already of killing monsters
Your experience is not enough to go with me into the Zone. Learn first to fight monsters well, and get a higher rank
No offence but I say "no". Experience I have is not enough to compete with you - you're a seasoned fighter, I am just a greenhorn in comparison with you
No, you already have enough people with you, I'll be more useful here
Do not be offended, but as long as you're not from our faction - we have no business with you
Listen to my orders
Sir, yes sir!
Follow me
How to respond to threats?
Keep high alert
Follow me, fire from medium range
Come follow me and attack only when absolutely necessary
Wait here
How to respond to threats?
Keep high alert
Wait here, fire from medium range
Wait here and attack only when absolutely necessary
Sneak after me
How to respond to threats?
Keep high alert
Sneak after me, fire from medium range
Sneak after me and attack only when absolutely necessary
Hide here
How to respond to threats?
Keep high alert
Hide here, fire from medium range
Hide here and attack only when absolutely necessary
Thanks, man. Good spent time, but I need to hit the road alone!
Bye, dude, Freedom rules!
Hey, man, let's be in cahoots!
Okay, let's hit the road
No, man, I'm busy, sorry
Damn no, I'm chicken out to go with you, maniac
Get lost, man, there were a lot of guys to go with you already - and I never saw them return
Sorry, I can't. I've conked out already, need some rest, take a dope, relax. Do you have some? Nope? Sad...
No, man, you're still a rookie. Get harder first
Damn no, it's hairy for me to go with ya - you're exploring such depths, I'm still wondering how you make it out in one piece
No, man, you have enough guys already, one "high" is too small for three
No, man, no offence, but as long as you're not from our faction - we have no business with you
Listen up, man, we need to chitchat a bit about tactics
Yep, I'm listening
Follow me, man
What if get into a jam?
Don't play chicken, but stay alert if something happens
Don't play chicken, and let badasses come closer before hit'em
Go on and hide the gun
Sit, take a break, I need to check something
What if get into a jam?
Take break, but stay alert if something happens
Don't be a chicken, take a break, but let badasses come closer before hit'em
Take a break man, and keep a low profile
Sneak with me, but don't kick up a fuss
What if get into a jam?
Sneak with me, just stay alert if something happens
Everything's fine, just don't kick up a fuss and let badasses come closer before hit'em
Listen, don't kick up a fuss to the last moment, catch what?
Hide here and don't kick up a fuss
What if get into a jam?
Hide silently, just stay alert if something happens
Hide silently, and let badasses come closer before hit'em
Hide as silently as you can to the last moment
That's all, bro', break up. Be good
You also don't get hurt, bro'.
Yo, bro', let's make a gang?
You've a point there, yep
No, I'd rather be a gang by myself
Fuck you, only suckers go with you
Get lost, badass, you always rat out bros' under fire
Nah, I'm burned out enough already
You're not tough enough, jerk. First make yourself a man, then return
Sorry, you're tough bro', makin' hardballs, I can't get over with you - only stay a lookout, at best
No, bro', you have one grunt already
No way, you're not of our gang - I've nothing to talk about with ya
Hey, bro', listen up here
What da fuck ya need?
Go after me, get it?
Yep, and what if some problems happen around?
Hold your jaw, if there are problems - just draw out a gun and make holes in the jerks
Go after me, if any problems happen - let'em get closer
Go after me and don't make noise. And hide your fuckin' gun already!
Stay here, get it? I'll check out and get back
Yep, and what if some problems happen around?
Hold your jaw, if there are problems - just draw out a gun and make holes in the jerks
Stay here I'm tellin' ya, if any problems happen - let'em get closer
Hold your jaw I'm tellin' ya. And hide you fuckin' gun already and keep quiet!
Go after me and keep quiet
Yep, and what if some problems happen around?
Hold your jaw, if there are problems - just draw out a gun and make holes in the jerks
Keep quiet I'm tellin' ya, don't get it? If any problems happen - let'em get closer
Keep quiet mothafucka, and don't make noise! And hide you fuckin' gun already!
Hide there and wait
Yep, and what if some problems happen around?
Hold your jaw, if there are problems - just draw out a gun and make holes in the jerks
Hide there sayin' ya, if any problems happen - let'em get closer
Whatta you don't get it? Hide there and be quiet, and hide you fuckin' gun!
